steps.title: Danho 1: Kubatanidza kuWebSocket Server
steps.description: Kubatanidza kuWebSocket server uchishandisa token yawakawana.

emailFormatDescription: Pasi pane mienzaniso yemamiriro emameseji akasiyana siyana. Muenzaniso wega wega une mafirdi akasiyana uye zvinangwa, zvinogona kugadziriswa maererano nezvinodikanwa chaizvo.
msgExamplesDescription: Pasi pane mienzaniso yemirairo yakasiyana siyana. Muenzaniso wega wega unoratidza mhando dzakasiyana dzemirairo dzinogona kugadziriswa uye kushandiswa maererano nezvinodikanwa chaizvo.
